HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Some new features added: Sort by tech - Allows sorting based on techlevel of apparel Armor-value option - Allows setting the armor value of apparel to be sorted under the Armored category The sort-options can also be combined so it is possible for example to sort by layer first, then tech Please leave a comment on the mod-page if you have an idea of more sorting-options!
Added a new sort-option, sort by Mod-name. It will categorize the apparel depending on what mod they were added from. Sorting is limited to two category-options at the same time.
